price: Na bila ya shaka tuliwaokoa Wana wa Israili katika adhabu ya kuwadhalilisha,
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ نَجَّيۡنَا بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ مِنَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ ٱلۡمُهِينِ
footnotes: Na kwa hakika Mwenyezi Mungu aliwaokoa Wana wa Israili na adhabu ya kuwadhalilisha.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walaqad najjaynā banī is'rāīla mina al-ʿadhābi al-muhīni
